overview:
Jeff Szczepanski is Founder and CTO of Allworx Corp where he responsible for the definition and market direction related to all of the company’s products, including having responsibility for the technical development of the entire Allworx product line.

Jeff is an expert in Digital Systems design with over 20 years experience in digital hardware and software development. He has been a leader and key contributor in all phases of product development. His contributions cover all areas of product development including market needs analysis, concept refinement, product definition, system design and all implementation activities from product inception through to product launch.

Prior to founding Allworx, Jeff was a Senior System Architect at Xeroxâ€™s wide format printing business. At Xerox, Jeff led design and development of a new printer product platform that became the cornerstone of Xerox’s wide-format printing business. Prior to Xerox, Jeff started his professional career at Eastman Kodak Company working as a key contributor on several innovative digital photographic products including the very successful kiosk based digital photographic print enlargement systems.

Jeff is an active alumnus of the Rochester Institute of Technology, graduating with highest honors with a Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering.
